storyInfo:
Trapped beneath the ruins, the Doctor talks with FrostNova about her past, her family, and her beliefs.
Then, she makes a small bet with the Doctor.

attributes.options: Wake up!

attributes.content: Wake up!!!
Wake up.... Wake up!
Come, Adam! Bring warm water!
Dad...
She's alive! Great, she's alive! Thank the ancestors!
Adam! Move it!
Dad...? Dad...?
Dad?
Yes, yes! I'm Dad, certainly!
Don't sleep. Don't sleep! Hold Daddy's hand and don't let go!
Don't sleep, my daughter! Stay with us!
Her body temperature keeps dropping! Mishka, do something!
No way to tilt the flow?
It's cold...! Daddy! I'm cold!
...Daughter... My daughter! Hold on!
Daddy, don't.... Don't ever leave me again....
Ruins of Chernobog 'District 14'
Upper superstructure levels

attributes.options: Wake up!;........;Hate to be a bother......

attributes.content: I'm awake.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: You didn't kill me while I was unconscious. Is that confidence or something else?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: This sort of thing has happened before....
I didn't have a choice.;........;Can I do that?

attributes.content: In any case, you didn't.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: Probably because you've been talking in your sleep.;........;Can I ask you about your life?

attributes.content: I'll take that as a sign that you've shown mercy. Now if I don't kill you, I'd call that returning the favor.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Why the consternation on your face?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Is it because...? You heard everything I saw in my dream?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: It seems I really did reveal something very unpleasant in my stupor.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Memories are something you can't lose even if you want to.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Have you explored our surroundings?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Couldn't find a way out, could you?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Looks like we won't be able to leave this place for a while.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: My father, as I call him, is named Buldrokkas'tee and was once an officer in the Ursus military.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: But my real father died a long time ago.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: As a child I vaguely remember a man taking a crossbow bolt to protect a woman; and the woman took me in her arms and stopped the second volley of bolts with her spine.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: You witnessed it with your own eyes....

attributes.content: I couldn't even comprehend what was happening at the time, and this memory just happened to never fade.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: As for what really happened, it was my grandmother who told me all about it later.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: When I pressed my grandmother for the meaning of that vision, and she had no more excuses, she told me.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: 'They were your real parents.... and they died protecting you.'
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: The funny thing is, I don't know them at all. I don't have any memories of them in my mind other than that vision.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: My own parents were just forgotten. It's hard for me to even say I have any feelings for them.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: So your grandmother raised you.

attributes.content: Half and half. The other half was the blood of the Ursus Infected.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: ...What?

attributes.content: Ugh....
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I was born in a mine in the northwest tundra.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: The mine was small and remote, not part of any city, and there are with no settlements around. There was nothing to see but snow all year round.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: This mine was hell, built only to spread death and slavery. There are countless such mines in the snowy plains.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: My birth parents were miners in that hellish pit.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: My grandmother stayed with me through my early years of learning to speak, but she never told me what crimes my parents committed to be sentenced to mine labor.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Later, when I was a little older, I asked around in the mines and learned that both of my parents had opposed the Emperor's wartime plans.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Their arrest was also an accident. The bottom two lines of the arrest warrant were blank, so the sergeant in charge of the search haphazardly copied the name on the door plate.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Without trial, my parents lost their names and moved from their warm little town to the cold Northlands to serve a centuries-long sentence.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Of course, no one would even live to see that, let alone ever leave alive.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: My grandmother was sentenced to the mines together as a 'harborer' of criminals, and moved with them.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: In fact, all the miners there had very similar experiences.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Naturally, both of my parents contracted Oripathy down there. All the miners did.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Now, even if you escaped this mine, no one would believe a word you said. You're just an Infected person, the most horrible, vicious and extreme of the Oripathy patients.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: However, the overseer of the mine, a certain Ursus military garrison, believed that the natural death rate of the Infected was still too slow.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: They drew straws to decide the fates of the Oripathy sufferers, killing them for fun and sport.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Maybe it was the miners that drove them crazy, rather than the snow. And maybe the Infected didn't count as human in their eyes.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: When I was five, my parents drew the black lot.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: When I was ten, my grandmother drew the black lot.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: When I was eleven, I drew the black lot myself, but it didn't matter, they didn't care about the lottery anymore. They just want to abandon the whole mine.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: By that time, all the adult Infected in the mines had died out, and the Emperor's new policies had left the mines starved of people.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Under orders, the Ursus overseers prepared to go ahead and execute the last of the Infected.... A few sick children.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Afterwards they would collapse the mines to serve as mass graves for the infected, to cover up their sins.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I learned later, in my travels, that they do this all the time.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I was sad. I was in pain.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I had broken a lot of ore. I lived with other kids in the mines, we loved each other, and we were all going to die for nothing.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Strong feelings hatched in my chest, the deaths of both my parents and my grandmother played vividly in my mind.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: When the execution started, my Arts erupted from within me, killing the four soldiers carrying out the execution..
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Of course, I didn't have the power to turn things around.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: The children were mere cattle to the overseers, who, as soldiers, carried sharp blades and wore solid armor, and we were like bugs who just managed to sting them.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: The cries of my siblings reached my ears just as they knocked me to the ground and the final wave of slaughter was about to begin...
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: A guerrilla band arrived.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: That was Buldrokkas'tee's team.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: All the Ursus soldiers guarding the Infected on the northern tundra have dreams, and this squad is their worst nightmare.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: You seem.... Proud of them.

attributes.content: If I could be, I would be.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: They killed every last executioner right before us, and the Infected children in the mine escaped.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: It's just...
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: The blood of my less fortunate companions and that of the dead soldiers flowed together and crystallized into ice on the inhumanly white ground.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: And I realized something, in that moment...
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: These Ursus soldiers were just following orders, at first. They shed the same blood as us.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Words and stories and fabricated animosity planted the root of cruelty and indifference in their bodies.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: It was Ursus that turned them into this.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Hiss, hmm....
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Please.... Do me a favor.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: In the left pocket of my jacket, there's are some candies. Take one.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: ...You can also take one for yourself if you want to try it.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: Take a candy.;Take two candies.

attributes.content: Afraid it's poisoned?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Maybe you don't like candy, but you can try it. You can't get this kind of candy in Lungmen.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: It's an Ursus specialty. Eat one, and there's one less in the world.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Consider it payback for helping me with the candy. Try it.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Oh? Looks like you've got a taste for snacks after all.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Just a warning, the sugar may be completely different from anything you've ever had before.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: But life is short. You should try something new, right?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: Then what?

attributes.content: Please put the candy in my mouth. Careful, not to touch my skin.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: It's not right, is it?;........;Like this?

attributes.content: From my fingertips to my neck, I'm paralyzed. I can only move from the neck up.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: But I can still freeze you instantly with even the slightest movement of my tongue.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: So don't worry. If you offend me, you'll be dead soon enough.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: (Give FrostNova the candy)

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: (Eat the candy);(Eat the candy);(Eat the candy)

attributes.content: It tastes very spicy.
It tastes extremely spicy.
It tastes horrifically spicy.
The look on your face....
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Hehehe....
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Sorry, couldn't resist teasing you a bit.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I've made that joke so many times that no one falls for it anymore.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: And now at last..... I saw a chance. Sorry, I just.... couldn't help myself.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: Why do you eat this stuff?

attributes.content: Because I'm cold.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I told you to be careful, because even if you touch just the tiniest bit of my skin, you'll get severe frostbite.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: If you had touched me before, I would have been able to tell by your reaction. You didn't. You didn't try to kill me.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: This phenomenon is beyond the accounts of extant academic sources.

attributes.content: My cold goes even beyond winter itself.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: The heat from the outside world cannot penetrate the bitter cold that surrounds my body. I love hot drinks because I can feel the warmth of the drink as the hot stream slides down my esophagus and into my stomach....
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Sadly, my insides get burned by hot drinks.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: The only pleasure I have left is this mix of alcohol and stimulating spices, with a little candy, if you can call it that.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: This warm feeling, even if it's only a brief illusion, brings me a bit of comfort.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Sorry for teasing you earlier.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: So, you just said it was cold because....

attributes.content: Oripathy created this horrible body of mine.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: At that moment, however, Buldrokkas'tee held my ice cold body that had never known warmth close to his chest.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: He didn't care at all that I'd frozen his unarmored arms to the point of partial necrosis.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I'm not sure if it was the emotions he was feeling at the time that infected me or not.... But I stayed awake and survived in the end.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: So Buldrokkas'tee became your father....

attributes.content: He's my whole family. As a young child, he was all I had.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Like I said, I don't remember much about my birth father.... Subconsciously, I did indeed thought of the huge beast as my real family. Hard to say.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: It's just that, despite his appearance, he's sentimental and stubborn in places, and isn't it funny that such a man used to be a killing machine for Ursus?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: It's not funny, is it? I can't laugh either.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: He was once a war hero of Ursus, who retired to a certain city-state in his old age.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: As a soldier of Ursus, but fighting for the Infected?

attributes.content: If you don't take Ursus at their word, you'll see that he's in good company. Although, there is only one that the Infected call 'Patriot'.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: His wife died young and he is survived by his son.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: By the way, he's a Sarkaz. From the most vicious Sarkaz clan at that. Still, his son became a scholar, a Wendigo scholar.... Perhaps the first in the history of Ursus.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Buldrokkas'tee contracted Oripathy during his last battle.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: His men helped him hide his illness, and he had even hidden everything from his own son. He didn't want to drag his son down with him, only to die in some dark corner of the world with the disease.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: However, during the 'Great Rebellion', his son was campaigning for the rights of the Infected. Long out of touch with his father, the son still sees him as an Ursus puppet.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: And he was. They commanded him to keep order in his own ranks at all costs. He allowed the soldiers to use their weapons, conflict erupted, and corpses piled in the snow drifts.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: That's who he was.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Then he saw his son on the street, his body by then completely cold.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I wonder if he thought of his son when he hugged me?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: His son fought for the Infected in his own way, and Buldrokkas'tee believed he had killed his own son.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: His team left with him. Since then, the Northwest Tundra has had a guerrilla force that strikes fear into the hearts of Ursus who dare to abuse the Infected.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: The old beast never said a word of any of this to me.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: He probably does think of me as his daughter. But I also want him to tell me this stuff, in his own words, to me.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I learned it all from his men. But Buldrokkas'tee himself won't speak to anyone.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: That monster of a stubborn old man with a fragile and porous heart.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: His team had passed through four mines before saving us children.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: The kids in those four camps weren't as lucky as us. They found their bodies buried in the collapsed mines, and the company of soldiers that carried out the executions were nowhere to be found.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: What did he find in me? Affection? Redemption? Or a little psychological comfort? I'm not sure.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: Is coughing and internal bleeding also a symptom of your.... infection?

attributes.content: Probably, maybe. Probably just the result of me overusing my Arts.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: It got pretty intense today. This sort of thing has only happened once before.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Unconsciousness, general paralysis, and the inability to move around even when conscious, have all happened. I know my own body.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: You can't use your Arts again.

attributes.content: Oh are you going to fight for me now?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Rhodes Islander.... What do I call you?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: You can call me what the Rhodes Island operators do.

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: ...I admit that you Rhodes Islanders can fight. But I still don't trust you. Not to mention the fact that you're supposed to be a pharmaceutical company.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: Rhodes Island does a lot of things.

attributes.content: What happens outside of combat is none of my business.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I watched you fight in Chernobog. You have a strong stance, something I confirmed with my own eyes, but I couldn't judge your character.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: ...I heard that Alex died at your hands. It makes me doubt your path.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Now, I can't let you leave Chernobog and cause more harm to Reunion's Infected.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: But you're willing to listen to so much of my crap....
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I'm going to assume you're not exactly as the other Infected describe.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: They're just scared.

attributes.content: Who wouldn't be afraid of the one who brings death?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, are you scared, right now??
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: Yes.;I'm not sure.;No.

attributes.content: It's normal to feel fear.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: It means you still have attachment to the world, and you still have much to do.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Do you really feel fear?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I doubt it.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: If you look so peaceful in the face of death, then I think maybe you really have no attachments at all.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Interesting. You are not scared?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I guess those who do not fear death have little love left for the world.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: A question I think about all the time....
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: 'Am I afraid of death?'
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I've heard that the Ursus garrisons call me the Yeti Princess, the Wintry Death....
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: The truth is, we were just a few ragtag squads wandering the tundra, barely scraping by.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: My Arts were powerful, I proved as much to my enemies and teammates alike.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Of course, my body, as you can see, is only that of an Oripathy sufferer.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I felt special, not because of my illness, but because of the feelings my frost instilled in me.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I saw my ability as a blessing, but Buldrokkas'tee, that grumpy old fart, treated it like a curse.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I couldn't feel the cold as we waded through the deep mud in the swamp, icy water soaking my legs.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: The old man wouldn't let go into battle, even as his soldiers took heavy casualties.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: He lit his oil lamp and sat quietly at the table by himself. I think he was crying, but I couldn't be sure, and I didn't know if I should comfort him.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: In my fifth year, I summoned a cold stream for the first time in the face of the enemy.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: One soldier was frozen into a block of ice, another accidentally fell on the block and they both shattered into pieces.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I joined the fight, the soldiers looked at me in awe, my brothers and sisters were proud of me, and other infected saidâ€”â€”
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: 'That's our big sister. She saved all our lives.'
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Did my Arts actually save anyone?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: The children from the mine carried the Originium crystals I had made, and we became the 'Yeti Squad'.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Those crystals radiate my cold, and we bring frost and vengeance to the enemies of the Infected.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: But that's really... just cold. The cold of winter that won't birth new life.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Even so, I feel very lucky. For my brothers and sisters could survive.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: We could live in this world.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: Have you ever wanted to coexist with ordinary people?

attributes.content: Ordinary people....
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: What do you mean by ordinary people?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: The unarmed but cold-eyed citizens of Chernobog who watch the infected being put to death? Or the Ursus conscripts in the mines who take pleasure in shooting us?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Every time I think of the faces of those overseers, I grit my teeth and fantasize about slitting their throats and drinking their blood....
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: But I don't hate the Ursus.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: As our guerrillas trudged through the snow, retreated from the valley, and were even chased by the Ursus army....
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: It was the Ursus who would put a few cups of breadbrew in their windows.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: The Ursus have never been cold-blooded creatures. The only enemy I have is the Empire of Ursus that has tormented the Infected so.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I don't think of ordinary people as the enemy. Ursus who are taught to hate the Infected are just ordinary people until they are blinded by that hate.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: It's only because 'enemies kill each other' that we've fought as we have. That's all.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I'm an Infected person, yes.... But before that, I was a normal person.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: What about what Reunion is doing now?

attributes.content: ...My main conflict with Buldrokkas'tee is in his work to protect the Infected community.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: 'Reunion, first name. That. Infected, can rely on.'
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: 'No matter where, Reunion goes. No matter what, it does. We cannot, abandon it. To lose Reunion, is to lose, Infected conviction. Fight for: conviction.'
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: That's what the old man says. That's what the old man believes.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: Why do you keep pausing like that?

attributes.content: Because that's how he talks now. I was just, *ahem*, preserving his cadence..
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, do you know why Rhodes Island is a nameless pharmaceutical company?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Because you can't take a stand on the world stage. As soon as you take that step, you'll become what Reunion is now.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: You will go down this road.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: Maybe.;........;Will we really?

attributes.content: Hmm.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: After a dozen years of rolling around on the tundra, an Infected woman reached out to us. She said, 'Come with me, and let us break all chains.'
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Imagine it: we met in the ruins of an old city that had become a battlefield. She was alone, carrying nothing but her roster and a book of ledgers.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Even the things she said I found impractical to the point of ridiculousness.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: But she said to us, 'Come with me.'
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: She fought with us, and with her strength and ideals, she became our friend. Together we left the snowy plains and headed for the cities of Ursus.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Whether was the words she spat out after pausing to think, or the swing of her great sword as she slashed alongside me, her power was real, and plenty impressive.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: When the wounded needed treatment, she was there. When discussing strategy and philosophy with the Infected, she was there. And when fighting against the Ursus death squads, she was also there.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: ...We even get to dine with some regular people. She didn't care. There was nothing in her eyes but the purest authenticity.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Our team grew and so did our friendships. The people brought in were good at fighting, and they were good people.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: At the time, I considered her my friend. She quietly helped me make these candies, even though she was terrible at it and they tasted worse.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: She made a funny face as she ate them. Then she'd force a smile at me.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: It was really something. She worked so hard to put on a brave face. It made me laugh.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Everything's different now.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Chernobog was destroyed by a Catastrophe, as you can well see. All the normal people here died or became newly Infected.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Their eyes were dead. No desire to live anymore whatsoever.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: If this is what she wanted, then we never should have followed her.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: And in case you didn't know, here's a secret....
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: She's planning to take over Lungmen. She says it won't be like Chernobog, and that the Infected will get their own city instead of a giant ruin like this place.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Would you trust someone like that?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: If she's acting, then she's the greatest actress the world has ever seen.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: But there's a thought stuck in my head.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: 'What are my chances of winning if I went up against her?'
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Once we part ways, once I find out she's been lying to the Infected, or that she's been plotting against them...
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I will fight her. She must know the price of betrayal.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: My countless deadly battles with Ursus have cleansed my mind and honed my skills.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I say with the utmost conviction: even if I cannot defeat her, I can let death take her from the world along with me.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: The stubborn old man wouldn't agree with me. He's fought too long, and his old age is driving him down a path that leads only to sacrifice.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: You don't agree with your father's ways.

attributes.content: He is strong against his enemies and he is loyal to his friends. But when he needs to stand up for them, he will face the reality that his friends make him weak.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: The old man who has believed in people all his life.... The old curmudgeon never thinks about what to do after being betrayed.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Maybe he's already taken that bitter pill. He bore the pain of betrayal over and over again his whole life, and he said nothing.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Whether it's an Infected who heard about Reunion and decided to join up, or an Infected who feels they can get away with anything.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Reunion is factionalizing and our leaders are doing nothing to stop it.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I will definitely go back to Chernobog after the Lungmen business is over. This time, I must face her.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Because... I am not long for this world.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: ...I promised my brothers I'd find a home for everyone. Before I fall, I have to make good on my promise...
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: Why are you telling me all this?

attributes.content: Because the look in your eyes tells me that you're not just another executioner.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: Maybe. So what?;........;I'm not sure if I am.

attributes.content: It's best to doubt yourself. It's the only way you won't go through life fanatically convinced of something.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: ...Do you hear voices outside?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: It sounds like they're digging above us.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: And my body is....
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Well.... I can move my fingers already.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.options: For what?;.......;Did I do something?

attributes.content: Thanks for helping me pass the time.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, I'd like to make a bet with you.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: If your people dig us out first...
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I will kill all of you in the blink of an eye.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: If my brothers and sisters break through first, your life ends here.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Wanna bet?
attributes.name: FrostNova
